summary: changes appearance of avenging wraith on apocalypse
descriptionHtml:
changes apperance of avenging wraith on apoc to something much creepier (see images)

requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16225/?]Apocalypse - Magic of Skyrim[/url] by [b]Enai Siaion[/b]

drop the file in your skyrim data folder and make sure it is selected in your load order or mod organizer

must be loaded AFTER Apocalypse and full original mod must be installed and functioning

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3381541/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Check out my other mods![/url]
author: mrjentipede

files.name: spooky avenging wraith for apocalypse spell pack
